{"id":732171994,"lang":"python3","time":"3 months, 2 weeks","timestamp":1656293938,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"127 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/732171994/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Add Two Numbers","memory":"13.9 MB","code":"# Definition for singly-linked list.\n# class ListNode:\n#     def __init__(self, val=0, next=None):\n#         self.val = val\n#         self.next = next\nclass Solution:\n    def addTwoNumbers(self, l1: Optional[ListNode], l2: Optional[ListNode]) -> Optional[ListNode]:\n        dummy=ListNode()\n        cur=dummy\n        \n        carry=0\n        while l1 or l2 or carry:\n            v1= l1.val if l1 else 0\n            v2=l2.val if l2 else 0\n            \n            \n            # create number\n            val=v1+v2+carry\n            carry=val//10\n            val=val%10\n            cur.next=ListNode(val)\n\n            #update pointer\n            cur=cur.next\n            l1=l1.next if l1 else None\n            l2=l2.next if l2 else None\n        \n        \n        return dummy.next\n            \n        ","compare_result":"","title_slug":"add-two-numbers"}
